00027 #include <QCompleter>
00028 #include <QLineEdit>
00029 #include <QPushButton>
00030 #include "formulacompleter.h"
00031 
00032 FormulaCompleter::FormulaCompleter(const ElementDatabase & db, 
00033                                    QLineEdit                  * ntr,
00034                                    QPushButton                * btn)
00035         : mCompleter(NULL),
00036           mLineEdit(ntr),
00037           mBtn(btn),
00038           mTokenStart(0), mTokenEnd(0)
00039 {
00040         mCompleter = new QCompleter(db.getSymbolList(), ntr);
00041         mCompleter->setCaseSensitivity(Qt::CaseSensitive);
00042         mCompleter->setModelSorting(QCompleter::CaseSensitivelySortedModel);
00043         mCompleter->setWidget(ntr);
00044         connect(ntr, SIGNAL(textEdited(const QString&)), 
00045                 this, SLOT(complete(const QString&)));
00046         connect(mCompleter, SIGNAL(highlighted(const QString&)), 
00047                 this, SLOT(highlighted(const QString&)));
00048         connect(mCompleter, SIGNAL(activated(const QString&)), 
00049                 this, SLOT(activated(const QString&)));
00050 }
00051 
00052 void FormulaCompleter::activated(const QString&)
00053 {
00054         if (mBtn) {
00055                 connect(mLineEdit, SIGNAL(returnPressed()), 
00056                         mBtn, SLOT(animateClick()));
00057         }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void FormulaCompleter::highlighted(const QString& text)
00061 {
00062         if (mBtn) { // don't interfer with main calc button
00063                 disconnect(mLineEdit, SIGNAL(returnPressed()), 
00064                            mBtn, SLOT(animateClick()));
00065         }
00066         mLineEdit->setText(
00067                 mCurText.mid(0, mTokenStart)+
00068                 text+
00069                 mCurText.mid(mTokenEnd+1) );
00070         mLineEdit->setCursorPosition(mTokenStart+text.length());
00071 }
00072 
00073 void FormulaCompleter::complete(const QString& text)
00074 {
00075         int cursorPos = mLineEdit->cursorPosition();
00076         mCurText = mLineEdit->text();
00077         mToken = text;
00078         QRegExp regexp("[^a-zA-Z0-9\\.\\,]");
00079         mTokenStart = mToken.lastIndexOf(regexp, (cursorPos > 0) ? cursorPos-1 : 0)+1;
00080         mTokenEnd  = mToken.indexOf(regexp, cursorPos)-1;
00081         if (mTokenStart < 0) mTokenStart = 0;
00082         if (mTokenEnd < 0) mTokenEnd = mToken.length()-1;
00083         mToken.remove(0, mTokenStart);
00084         int tmpPrefixEnd = mTokenEnd+1-mTokenStart; // after remove above
00085         mToken.remove(tmpPrefixEnd, mToken.length()-tmpPrefixEnd);
00086         mCompleter->setCompletionPrefix(mToken);
00087         mCompleter->complete();
00088 }
